headline: Repare Therapeutics Announces Acquisition of Polθ ATPase Inhibitor, RP-3467, by Gilead Sciences for Up To $30 Million in Total Consideration
summary: CAMBRIDGE, Mass. & MONTREAL, December 24, 2025--Repare Therapeutics Inc. ("Repare" or the "Company") (Nasdaq: RPTX), a clinical-stage precision oncology company, today announced a definitive asset purchase agreement for Gilead Sciences, Inc. to acquire Repare’s polymerase theta (Polθ) ATPase inhibitor, RP-3467 (the "Gilead Agreement").
